title: 'A family died... in front of my eyes': Mayor in Kyiv suburb laments civilian deaths as people try to flee the Russian attack on Ukraine - CNN
content:
1. 'A family died... in front of my eyes': Mayor in Kyiv suburb laments civilian deaths as people try to flee the Russian attack on Ukraine  CNN
  2. At Least 4 Civilians Killed in Shelling by Russian Forces Near Kyiv  The New York Times
  3. Heavy fighting near Ukraine's capital Kyiv - BBC News  BBC News
  4. Ukrainians flee Russian bombs as civilians are killed in small Kyiv suburb  New York Post
  5. Journalists, locals run from heavy shelling in Ukraine's Irpin  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The civilian death toll is rising in Ukraine after a blast struck an evacuation crossing point in a Kyiv suburb as more people try to flee the Russian invasion.
